derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin inflexibilis, from in- 'not' + flexibilis 'flexible'

entry.tran: 不可改变的;不容变更的
entry.def: Something that is inflexible cannot be altered in any way, even if the situation changes.

example.ex: Workers insisted the new system was too inflexible...
example.tran: 工人们坚持认为新制度太不灵活。

example.ex: Charles was a man of settled habits and inflexible routine.
example.tran: 查尔斯是一个恪守习惯、生活规律不容打乱的人。

entry.def: If you say that someone is inflexible, you are criticizing them because they refuse to change their mind or alter their way of doing things.

example.ex: His opponents viewed him as stubborn, dogmatic, and inflexible.
example.tran: 他的反对者们认为他固执、教条、僵化。

sentences.sentence: "took an uncompromising stance in the peace talks"

means.word_mean: 4. incapable of adapting or changing to meet circumstances;

auth_sentence.content: Spain has to deregulate its absolutely inflexible job market.
auth_sentence.res_content: Spain has to deregulate its absolutely inflexible job market.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Spain has to deregulate its absolutely inflexible job market.

auth_sentence.content: But he rejected criticism that the UK Government was inflexible.
auth_sentence.res_content: But he rejected criticism that the UK Government was inflexible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But he rejected criticism that the UK Government was inflexible.

auth_sentence.content: He remained inflexible against any form of compromise.
auth_sentence.res_content: He remained inflexible against any form of compromise.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He remained inflexible against any form of compromise.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 柔韧的,易弯曲的,灵活的,能变形的
stems_affixes.word_buile: flex弯曲+ible能……的→adj.柔韧的,易弯曲的,灵活的,能变形的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 僵硬的,不灵活的;坚定的,固执的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+flexible[adj.柔韧的,易弯曲的,灵活的,能变形的]→adj.僵硬的,不灵活的;坚定的,固执的
de离开+flex弯曲→离开[偏离]弯曲→偏斜
in向内+flex弯曲→v.弯曲; 内曲

means.word_mean: 僵硬的, 不可弯曲的

sentences.en: The new plastic is completely inflexible.
sentences.cn: 这种新塑料是完全不可弯曲的。

means.word_mean: 不可动摇的, 坚定不移的

sentences.en: Neither threats nor promises could change his inflexible determination.
sentences.cn: 威胁与利诱均不能改变他坚定的决心。
